channel.title: [PI] Dropping [317]
channel.description: I can't drop items on my server. Whenever I try dropping something, it says you cannot drop items. Can someone help me? I found this file called dropitem.java, perhaps that has something to do with it?

item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

zaibas:

Delete everything from „if(c.playerRights >= 1” to the first } below it that’s all. I did the same with my delta source. It’s like that to prevent mods, admins from dropping valuable items

I’m pretty sure I tried that already, but I’ll try again.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Dropping [317]
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

[code]package server.model.players.packets;

import server.Config;
import server.Server;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;

/**

  • Drop Item
    **/
    public class DropItem implements PacketType {

    @Override
    public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
    int itemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
    c.getInStream().readUnsignedByte();
    c.getInStream().readUnsignedByte();
    int slot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
    if(c.arenas()) {
    c.sendMessage(“You can’t drop items inside the arena!”);
    return;
    }
    if(c.inTrade) {
    c.sendMessage(“You can’t drop items while trading!”);
    return;
    }
    if (c.playerRights >= 1 || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“noname”)){
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot drop items!”);
    return;
    }

     boolean droppable = true;
 for (int i : Config.UNDROPPABLE_ITEMS) {
 	if (i == itemId) {
 		droppable = false;
 		break;
 	}
 }
 if(c.playerItemsN[slot] != 0 && itemId != -1 && c.playerItems[slot] == itemId + 1) {
 	if(droppable) {
 		if (c.underAttackBy > 0) {
 			if (c.getShops().getItemShopValue(itemId) > 1000) {
 				c.sendMessage("You may not drop items worth more than 1000 while in combat.");
 				return;
 			}
 		}
 		Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.playerItemsN[slot], c.getId());
 		c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, slot, c.playerItemsN[slot]);
 	} else {
 		c.sendMessage("This items cannot be dropped.");
 	}
 }

    }
    }
    [/code]

I’ve tried removing the “You cannot drop items” part, nothing happened.

Read full topic

Post the original DropItem.java you had.

Find something like that for drops and if it says Admins_can_drop = false

change the “false” “True”

i am not 100% sure[/quote]
